title: ReAct (Reason and Act) Pattern Documentation
content: Implementation follows the ReAct prompting pattern which combines reasoning and action taking in language models. The pattern requires careful state management to prevent callback loops.

title: Lua State Management Best Practices
content: State management implementation follows Lua best practices for module-level state with proper initialization and cleanup functions.

title: OpenAI Tool Calling API Reference
content: OpenAI provider implementation references the official OpenAI tool calling API documentation for proper handling of tool_use callbacks and streaming responses.

title: Google Gemini Function Calling API
content: Gemini provider implementation follows Google's Gemini API documentation for handling tool calls and function execution in streaming responses.

title: JSON Parser Implementation Pattern
content: ReAct parser enhancement follows established JSON parsing patterns in the codebase, specifically the existing JsonParser implementation for partial JSON handling.

title: Neovim Plugin Testing Framework
content: Unit tests implementation follows the established testing patterns in the codebase using the busted testing framework for Lua.
